segments.text: This scene in the kitchen draws me in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's concentration on the plate is admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the overflowing sink escapes her notice entirely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down, pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's precarious climb on the stool is thrilling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snagging cookies with such focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The unstable stool adds real danger to their game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I dislike how the water damages everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinet doors are getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view offers a serene escape.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, anger builds at the carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
